13namespace v8 {
14namespace internal {
15
16class AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler : public AsyncBuiltinsAssembler {
17 public:
18 explicit AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler(compiler::CodeAssemblerState* state)
19 : AsyncBuiltinsAssembler(state) {}
20
21 protected:
22 template <typename Descriptor>
23 void AsyncFunctionAwait();
24
25 void AsyncFunctionAwaitResumeClosure(
26 const TNode<Context> context, const TNode<Object> sent_value,
27 JSGeneratorObject::ResumeMode resume_mode);
28};
29
30void AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler::AsyncFunctionAwaitResumeClosure(
31 TNode<Context> context, TNode<Object> sent_value,
32 JSGeneratorObject::ResumeMode resume_mode) {
33 DCHECK(resume_mode == JSGeneratorObject::kNext ||
34 resume_mode == JSGeneratorObject::kThrow);
35
36 TNode<JSAsyncFunctionObject> async_function_object =
37 CAST(LoadContextElement(context, Context::EXTENSION_INDEX));
38
39 // Inline version of GeneratorPrototypeNext / GeneratorPrototypeReturn with
40 // unnecessary runtime checks removed.
41
42 // Ensure that the {async_function_object} is neither closed nor running.
43 CSA_SLOW_DCHECK(
44 this, SmiGreaterThan(
45 LoadObjectField<Smi>(async_function_object,
46 JSGeneratorObject::kContinuationOffset),
47 SmiConstant(JSGeneratorObject::kGeneratorClosed)));
48
49 // Remember the {resume_mode} for the {async_function_object}.
50 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(async_function_object,
51 JSGeneratorObject::kResumeModeOffset,
52 SmiConstant(resume_mode));
53
54 // Resume the {receiver} using our trampoline.
55 CallBuiltin(Builtin::kResumeGeneratorTrampoline, context, sent_value,
56 async_function_object);
57
58 // The resulting Promise is a throwaway, so it doesn't matter what it
59 // resolves to. What is important is that we don't end up keeping the
60 // whole chain of intermediate Promises alive by returning the return value
61 // of ResumeGenerator, as that would create a memory leak.
62}
63
64TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionEnter, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
65 auto closure = Parameter<JSFunction>(Descriptor::kClosure);
66 auto receiver = Parameter<Object>(Descriptor::kReceiver);
67 auto context = Parameter<Context>(Descriptor::kContext);
68
69 // Compute the number of registers and parameters.
70 TNode<SharedFunctionInfo> shared = LoadObjectField<SharedFunctionInfo>(
71 closure, JSFunction::kSharedFunctionInfoOffset);
72 TNode<IntPtrT> formal_parameter_count = ChangeInt32ToIntPtr(
73 LoadSharedFunctionInfoFormalParameterCountWithoutReceiver(shared));
74 TNode<BytecodeArray> bytecode_array =
75 LoadSharedFunctionInfoBytecodeArray(shared);
76 TNode<IntPtrT> frame_size = ChangeInt32ToIntPtr(LoadObjectField<Uint32T>(
77 bytecode_array, BytecodeArray::kFrameSizeOffset));
78 TNode<IntPtrT> parameters_and_register_length =
79 Signed(IntPtrAdd(WordSar(frame_size, IntPtrConstant(kTaggedSizeLog2)),
80 formal_parameter_count));
81
82 // Allocate and initialize the register file.
83 TNode<FixedArrayBase> parameters_and_registers =
84 AllocateFixedArray(HOLEY_ELEMENTS, parameters_and_register_length);
85 FillFixedArrayWithValue(HOLEY_ELEMENTS, parameters_and_registers,
86 IntPtrConstant(0), parameters_and_register_length,
87 RootIndex::kUndefinedValue);
88
89 // Allocate and initialize the promise.
90 TNode<JSPromise> promise = NewJSPromise(context);
91
92 // Allocate and initialize the async function object.
93 TNode<NativeContext> native_context = LoadNativeContext(context);
94 TNode<Map> async_function_object_map = CAST(LoadContextElement(
95 native_context, Context::ASYNC_FUNCTION_OBJECT_MAP_INDEX));
96 TNode<JSAsyncFunctionObject> async_function_object =
97 UncheckedCast<JSAsyncFunctionObject>(
98 AllocateInNewSpace(JSAsyncFunctionObject::kHeaderSize));
99 StoreMapNoWriteBarrier(async_function_object, async_function_object_map);
100 StoreObjectFieldRoot(async_function_object,
101 JSAsyncFunctionObject::kPropertiesOrHashOffset,
102 RootIndex::kEmptyFixedArray);
103 StoreObjectFieldRoot(async_function_object,
104 JSAsyncFunctionObject::kElementsOffset,
105 RootIndex::kEmptyFixedArray);
106 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(
107 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kFunctionOffset, closure);
108 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(
109 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kContextOffset, context);
110 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(
111 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kReceiverOffset, receiver);
112 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(async_function_object,
113 JSAsyncFunctionObject::kInputOrDebugPosOffset,
114 SmiConstant(0));
115 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(async_function_object,
116 JSAsyncFunctionObject::kResumeModeOffset,
117 SmiConstant(JSAsyncFunctionObject::kNext));
118 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(
119 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kContinuationOffset,
120 SmiConstant(JSAsyncFunctionObject::kGeneratorExecuting));
121 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(
122 async_function_object,
123 JSAsyncFunctionObject::kParametersAndRegistersOffset,
124 parameters_and_registers);
125 StoreObjectFieldNoWriteBarrier(
126 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kPromiseOffset, promise);
127
128 Return(async_function_object);
129}
130
131TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionReject, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
132 auto async_function_object =
133 Parameter<JSAsyncFunctionObject>(Descriptor::kAsyncFunctionObject);
134 auto reason = Parameter<Object>(Descriptor::kReason);
135 auto context = Parameter<Context>(Descriptor::kContext);
136 TNode<JSPromise> promise = LoadObjectField<JSPromise>(
137 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kPromiseOffset);
138
139 // Reject the {promise} for the given {reason}, disabling the
140 // additional debug event for the rejection since a debug event
141 // already happend for the exception that got us here.
142 CallBuiltin(Builtin::kRejectPromise, context, promise, reason,
143 FalseConstant());
144
145 Return(promise);
146}
147
148TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionResolve, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
149 auto async_function_object =
150 Parameter<JSAsyncFunctionObject>(Descriptor::kAsyncFunctionObject);
151 auto value = Parameter<Object>(Descriptor::kValue);
152 auto context = Parameter<Context>(Descriptor::kContext);
153 TNode<JSPromise> promise = LoadObjectField<JSPromise>(
154 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kPromiseOffset);
155
156 CallBuiltin(Builtin::kResolvePromise, context, promise, value);
157
158 Return(promise);
159}
160
161// AsyncFunctionReject and AsyncFunctionResolve are both required to return
162// the promise instead of the result of RejectPromise or ResolvePromise
163// respectively from a lazy deoptimization.
164TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionLazyDeoptContinuation, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
165 auto promise = Parameter<JSPromise>(Descriptor::kPromise);
166 Return(promise);
167}
168
169TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionAwaitRejectClosure, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
170 CSA_DCHECK_JS_ARGC_EQ(this, 1);
171 const auto sentError = Parameter<Object>(Descriptor::kSentError);
172 const auto context = Parameter<Context>(Descriptor::kContext);
173
174 AsyncFunctionAwaitResumeClosure(context, sentError,
175 JSGeneratorObject::kThrow);
176 Return(UndefinedConstant());
177}
178
179TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionAwaitResolveClosure, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
180 CSA_DCHECK_JS_ARGC_EQ(this, 1);
181 const auto sentValue = Parameter<Object>(Descriptor::kSentValue);
182 const auto context = Parameter<Context>(Descriptor::kContext);
183
184 AsyncFunctionAwaitResumeClosure(context, sentValue, JSGeneratorObject::kNext);
185 Return(UndefinedConstant());
186}
187
188// ES#abstract-ops-async-function-await
189// AsyncFunctionAwait ( value )
190// Shared logic for the core of await. The parser desugars
191// await value
192// into
193// yield AsyncFunctionAwait{Caught,Uncaught}(.generator_object, value)
194// The 'value' parameter is the value; the .generator_object stands in
195// for the asyncContext.
196template <typename Descriptor>
197void AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler::AsyncFunctionAwait() {
198 auto async_function_object =
199 Parameter<JSAsyncFunctionObject>(Descriptor::kAsyncFunctionObject);
200 auto value = Parameter<Object>(Descriptor::kValue);
201 auto context = Parameter<Context>(Descriptor::kContext);
202
203 TNode<SharedFunctionInfo> on_resolve_sfi =
204 AsyncFunctionAwaitResolveSharedFunConstant();
205 TNode<SharedFunctionInfo> on_reject_sfi =
206 AsyncFunctionAwaitRejectSharedFunConstant();
207 TNode<JSPromise> outer_promise = LoadObjectField<JSPromise>(
208 async_function_object, JSAsyncFunctionObject::kPromiseOffset);
209 Await(context, async_function_object, value, outer_promise, on_resolve_sfi,
210 on_reject_sfi);
211
212 // Return outer promise to avoid adding an load of the outer promise before
213 // suspending in BytecodeGenerator.
214 Return(outer_promise);
215}
216
217// Called by the parser from the desugaring of 'await'.
218TF_BUILTIN(AsyncFunctionAwait, AsyncFunctionBuiltinsAssembler) {
219 AsyncFunctionAwait<Descriptor>();
220}
221

223} // namespace v8
